articles.title: Australian far-right Senator Pauline Hanson slammed for wearing burqa to parliament to demand ban - CBS News
articles.description: Anti-immigration party senator Pauline Hanson said of her protest: "If they don't want me wearing it — ban the burqa."
articles.content:
Sydney — A far-right Australian politician sparked outrage Monday after donning a burqa at the country's parliament, in a display that other lawmakers condemned as racist, unsafe and disrespectful.
… [+2615 chars]
